description: There is currently no federal heat law, but states have been passing protections as workers toil in extreme temperatures.
title: With no federal standard for heat, states are making their own to protect workers

description: Baldwin is heralded for being everything from an orator, activist and fashion icon. None of that would be true if he weren't a writer first. We asked fans to break down what made his writing work.
title: On the centennial of his birth, James Baldwin remains relevant today

description: Families are expected to spend $875 on average for school supplies, clothing and backpacks this year. Here are a few ways to help lower the bill.
title: 5 tips to save money on back-to-school shopping — this weekend and beyond

description: Kayak Cross, formerly known as Extreme Slalom, is mayhem. Kayakers bombard down strong currents, knocking other athletes out of the way while swerving around padded buoys hanging from above.
title: Action-packed and heart-thumping, Kayak Cross makes its Olympic debut in Paris

description: Vice President Harris’ campaign said Friday that two-thirds of the historic haul came from first-time donors to her presidential bid as Trump reports $139 million raised.
title: Harris announces record-breaking $310 million July fundraising haul

description: For the first time in years, people are buying more groceries, including pricier brands, to replace restaurant outings. From McDonald's to Starbucks, fast food and cafes are feeling it.
title: Inflation math is changing America's dinner plans

description: This week is the Olympics! That means an unusual quantity of sports questions, with an occasional sop to the rest of the news cycle. Enjoy!
title: Is 'stiff arm' a reference to politics or the Olympics? Find out in the quiz

description: A new generation of blood tests can help diagnose Alzheimer’s disease. But many doctors don’t yet know how to use them.
title: New blood tests can help diagnose Alzheimer's. Are doctors ready for what's next?

description: The crash last November off the coast of Japan killed eight. The Air Force said the pilot decided to keep flying rather than heed multiple warnings that he should land.
title: Osprey crash was caused by pilot's decision to keep flying with cracks in a gear

description: At the Paris Olympics, the beach volleyball stadium, in the shadow of the Eiffel Tower, has been one of the most in-demand venues. It’s an energetic, club-like experience for the crowd, and the beach volleyball athletes who play there say it’s iconic.
title: How the beach volleyball venue became one of the Paris Olympics’ hottest tickets
